accessibility: Always pair inputs with labels using htmlFor/id
Use semantic HTML (button over div with onClick)
Test with keyboard navigation (Tab, Enter, Space)
performance: Components use CSS variables for instant theme switching (no re-render)

tokens: Typography uses clamp() for fluid responsive sizing
Colors use OKLCH with automatic RGB fallbacks
